item.title: Pack Temperature Control Valves – Right Valve Inoperative

remarks.para: Right valve may be inoperative deactivated in mid position provided left pack is operative in AUTO.

numlitem.para: Operate Right Pack in AUTO only.
Operate Left Pack in AUTO or STBY mode as appropriate.

placard.para: Placard near right Pack Control Selector "RT PACK TEMPERATURE CONTROL VALVE INOP IN MID POSITION – RT PACK AUTO ONLY" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Gain Access to Pack Temperature Control Valve by opening the right ECS access door (194ER).
Disconnect, cap and stow both electrical connectors on Pack Temperature Control Valve.
Rotate manual override knob on Pack Temperature Control Valve until visual position indicator is midway between open and closed positions.
